attributes.action: appoint David Miliband as PM and Gordon Brown to Chancellor of the Exchequer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Labour are to have any chance of winning the next general election, the Labour Party needs a leader that will win votes (simple politics really!). I believe that David Miliband can (and will be) that man and that Gordon Brown's efforts would be better served as Chancellor of the Exchequer, whereby his services were in my opinion, highly valued in 1997-2007.
